trans-unit.source: Represents a single user interface (UI) entity managed by an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> 管理的用户界面 (UI) 实体。

trans-unit.source: The sole purpose of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> is to paint and hit test.
trans-unit.target: 唯一目的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>是绘制和命中测试。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> does not have a window handle (HWND), as it is rendered on the adorner window control of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>不具有窗口句柄 (HWND) 所呈现的装饰器控件上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> can have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>可以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>与之关联。

trans-unit.source: A successfully hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> has the opportunity to push a new or different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> onto the behavior stack of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 成功通过命中测试<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>有机会推送一个新的或不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>到的行为堆栈<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[行为服务概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create your own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> based class with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建你自己<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>基于类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>与之关联。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>类。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no behavior.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />，或者，如果不存在任何行为，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> 的边界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> 的边界。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Bounds%2A> to create a glyph with the specific dimensions and position.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Bounds%2A>若要创建具有特定维度和位置的标志符号。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。

trans-unit.source: A point to hit-test.
trans-unit.target: 要进行命中测试的点。

trans-unit.source: Provides hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: 提供命中测试逻辑。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated with <paramref name="p" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> 与 <paramref name="p" /> 关联，则为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A>方法是`abstract`方法，它强制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>实现提供命中的测试逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Given any point, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> has decided to be involved with that location, it will need to return a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的任何时刻，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>决定，位置，它将需要返回一个有效的情况下与涉及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, returning `null` will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to ignore the location.
trans-unit.target: 否则，返回`null`将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>忽略该位置。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> to see if the point is within this glyph.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A>以查看该点是否在此标志符号。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides paint logic.
trans-unit.target: 提供绘制逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide paint logic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A>方法是`abstract`方法，它强制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>实现提供的绘制逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The `pe` parameter contains the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> related to the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: `pe`参数包含<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的装饰器窗口相关<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> to draw a glyph.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A>用于绘制标志符号。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 更改与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.SetBehavior(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior)" /> method is called by inheriting classes to change the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.SetBehavior(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior)" />通过继承类来更改调用方法<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" />与关联<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />。
